posts.title: 4月，我的第一篇博客
posts.text: SHORTCUTShexo init 建站hexo g 生成hexo clean 清除hexo s 启动hexohexo d 部署至githubgit clone ‘website’.git themes/‘folder’ 克隆主题cd\ 返回根目录cd.. 返回上一层dir 显示当前文件夹内容 #mac上是ls‘atom’ ‘filename’ 用指定editor去编辑文件 比如_config.yml这个文件是基础设置 Chapter 1 3月回顾 出现类似以下bug不影响使用，和软件开发者相关，参见本文https://www.haoyizebo.com/posts/710984d0/及https://juejin.cn/post/7003301549359235086 (node:18440) Warning: Accessing non-existent property ‘lineno’ of module exports inside circular dependency (Use node --trace-warnings ... to show where the warning was created) (node:18440) Warning: Accessing non-existent property ‘column’ of module exports inside circular dependency (node:18440) Warning: Accessing non-existent property ‘filename’ of module exports inside circular dependency (node:18440) Warning: Accessing non-existent property ‘lineno’ of module exports inside circular dependency (node:18440) Warning: Accessing non-existent property ‘column’ of module exports inside circular dependency (node:18440) Warning: Accessing non-existent property ‘filename’ of module exports inside circular dependency Chapter 2 4月规划 HEXO换一个主题 1）codesheep推荐 https://github.com/litten/hexo-theme-yilia 域名更换 打开hexo目录下的_config.yml文件，找到URL，将其更换 在 hexo/source 目录下新建 CNAME 文件，并向其中加入自己域名，不要带www. 可以先新建txt再删除后缀 解析域名。添加两条解析记录 1）www CNAME 默认 你的项目地址，如name.github.io 2）@ A 默认 ipv4地址 在cmd里输入ping name.github.io 在GitHub项目设置中自定义域名 进入你的项目 - Settings - Pages - Custom domain 致谢总规 https://www.bilibili.com/medialist/play/watchlater/BV1Yb411a7ty域名 https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/54575457

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
